name: Voluntary limitation of license
text: §453-8.1  Voluntary limitation of license.  A physician, osteopathic physician, or surgeon may request, in writing, that the board limit the individual's license to practice.  The board may grant the request and may impose conditions on the limited license.  The board shall determine whether and when the limitation shall be removed. [L 1976, c 219, pt of §14; am L 1983, c 92, pt of §1(6); am L 2008, c 5, §12]
